title: Brisinger- Chapters 1-7- READ ON IPOD!! txt
description:
These are the first seven chapters of Brisingr by Paolini. I converted them to txt format. When doing this I had problems because the text would not wrap whuch made reading it difficult. I made the text wrap. This is perfect for reading on ipod!

To Read on iPod:
Place these files in the notes folder on you ipod. GO to my computer, ipod. YOu will find them on your ipod under extras, notes. Comment for clarification.


DO YOU WANT OTHER BOOKS TO READ ON IPOD?? ASK ME AND ILL SEE WHAT I CAN DO.

IS THIS A GOOD IDEA, DOES THIS WORK?


COMMENT PLEASE
